title: The women who fought back against Hollywood
itunes:title: The women who fought back against Hollywood
itunes:subtitle: Helen O’Hara highlights female pioneers of film, and reveals some of the challenges faced by women working in Hollywood over the past century.
description:
Film critic Helen O’Hara talks about her new book Women vs Hollywood, which highlights female pioneers of film, and reveals some of the challenges faced by women working in Hollywood over the past century – from controlling studios and sexist roles to unequal pay and #MeToo.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
